mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blacklist (declCom, blackPerson, transactionNum, bidNum, title, content, reportDate, roleType) VALUES (#{declCom}, #{blackPerson}, #{transactionNum}, #{bidNum}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 'B')
mapper.select: select bl.blackPerson as blackPerson, a.title as title, t.date as tdate, bl.reportDate as rdate, t.transactionNum as tnum from blacklist as bl join transaction t ON t.transactionNum = bl.transactionNum join auction a ON t.auctionNum = a.auctionNum where bl.declCom = #{blackNum}
